attributes.action: Permanently fix the UK clocks to British Summer time (BST).
attributes.additional_details: The European parliament no longer mandates it and the US senate have approved making daylight saving time permanent. The majority of the views and opinions I have observed support the removal of this act and saw the clocks changing as a nuisance.
attributes.background: Every year the clocks go forward by 1 hour in late March into BST and back 1 hour in late October (GMT). I propose that the clocks be fixed to BST permanently.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612319
